    • org.wallerlab.yoink.math.linear.CommonsMatrix

    public class CommonsMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements Matrix<org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix>
    Matrix Adaptor pattern. this class i sto convert from our own implementation to the appache commons maths lib.
